name: Pioneer
description:
INTRODUCTION

For the blind, all that awaits them is unknown. This game uses the sound of the guide stick as a clue to examine the player's memory of sound, simulating the difficulties of blind people in daily life.

HOW TO PLAY

  1. Remember all three safe sounds
  2. Choose a safe route based on your memory
  3. Go as far as possible

CONTROLS

  • Left Mouse Button: Knock the square
  • Right Mouse Button: Move forward
  • Escape: Restore Cursor / Quit Full Screen

OBJECTIVE

This game lends a certain heroism to the blind, praising their faith of living bravely and fearlessly. The aim is to make players feel the inconvenience of visual loss through simulation, and to call on society to pay attention to the lives of blind people.
